short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension quickly retrieves all images on the current webpage and offers download and link copying functions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The purpose of this Google Chrome extension is to help users conveniently access images. It quickly retrieves all the images on the current webpage and offers download and link copying functions. This is especially useful for users who need to access images on a webpage, such as designers and website editors, as it saves them a lot of time and effort.

Users should install this extension as it allows them to work and study more efficiently. Image retrieval is a common requirement in daily use, and this extension helps users satisfy this requirement quickly. Additionally, it reduces the time users spend searching for images online, improving their work efficiency.

In summary, this Google Chrome extension is a very useful tool that helps users conveniently access images, improving their work efficiency and learning effectiveness. If you frequently need to use images, then installing this extension would be a great choice.

这款谷歌扩展插件的用途是帮助用户更加便捷地获取图片。它可以在浏览网页时，快速地获取当前页面上的所有图片，并提供下载、复制链接等功能。对于需要获取当前网页图片的用户，比如设计师、网站编辑等，可以节省大量时间和精力。

用户应该安装这款插件，因为它可以让他们更加高效地工作和学习。在日常使用中，获取图片是一个常见的需求，而这款插件可以帮助用户快速地满足这个需求。此外，它还可以减少用户在网上搜索图片的时间，提高他们的工作效率。

总之，这款谷歌扩展插件是一个非常实用的工具，可以帮助用户更加便捷地获取图片，提高工作效率和学习效果。如果你需要频繁使用图片，那么安装这款插件将会是一个不错的选择。
